com.ijg.darklight.web.api

Class DarklightAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ijg.darklight.web.api.DarklightAPI

  • public class DarklightAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the Darklight SDK, acts as a middle man instead of dealing directly with APIRequest
    Version:
    .1
    Author:
    Isaac Grant, Lucas Nicodemus
    See Also:

      • individualSessionRequest

        public APIRequest individualSessionRequest(long sessionID,
                                  java.lang.String endpoint,
                                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
        Create a request for the individual session API
        Parameters:
        sessionID - The ID of the session
        endpoint - The endpoint to query
        parameters - The parameters of the actual query
        Returns:
        The generated APIRequest
        See Also:
        APIRequest, DarklightSDK

      • makeQueryString

        Generate a query string suitable to pass to the APIRequest constructor
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters from which the query string will be created
        Returns:
        A query string suitable to pass to the APIRequest constructor
